title: That’s Not True!!!!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>….and that’s why Ruby loves μ’s and Hanayo-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Y-, yeah…. Everyone in μ’s is amazing huh. Thanks to everyone pulling me along, I can stand there with them. That’s why….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s not true!!! To Ruby, everyone in μ’s, Hanayo-chan included, can draw us fans in! So don’t say it like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Uu…., T-, thank you, Ruby-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>So, did you understand that Ruby really loves μ’s and Hanayo-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah. It makes me happy and want to work even harder from now on<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe.... I’m glad!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, this time I’ll talk about the points I love about Aqours…. And the points I love about Ruby-chan, would you hear it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh…. Ruby is happy to talk about Aqours, but about Ruby too….? Ruby is only in Aqours because of everyone else, so….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s not true!!!! I made a note of all the things I love about Aqours, listen to it all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
